description: Returns information about a version of an Lambda layer, with a link to download the layer archive that's valid for 10 minutes.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The ARN of the layer version.

nested_items.name: Location
nested_items.description: A link to the layer archive in Amazon S3 that is valid for 10 minutes.

nested_items.name: CodeSha256
nested_items.description: The SHA-256 hash of the layer archive.

nested_items.name: CodeSize
nested_items.description: The size of the layer archive in bytes.

nested_items.name: SigningProfileVersionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for a signing profile version.

nested_items.name: SigningJobArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a signing job.

nested_items.name: LayerVersionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the layer version.

nested_items.name: CreatedDate
nested_items.description: The date that the layer version was created, in ISO-8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD).

nested_items.name: CompatibleArchitectures
nested_items.description: A list of compatible instruction set architectures.
